title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ, which involve opening the scripted resource editor example and selecting a test.xml file in the Navigator, choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' does not have any effect. The scripted resource editor example remains active, and the file is not opened with the default text editor.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for the test.xml file, the default text editor should be opened, even if the file is already open with a different type of editor.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. Ensure that the editor used for this file is the scripted resource editor example
4. With the file selected in the Navigator, choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
Expected result: The default text editor should be opened with the test.xml file, regardless of any previous open editors for the same file.
